title: vAnattu karumEgam
sahitya:
vAnattu karumEgam Ananda kaNNIr vaDittu Or nAL arivAyO


anupallavi

  mOnam kaDandavanai mOhiniyin udaDu pAnam ugandavanai pArmElE kaNDu


caraNam    Enga vaittAn tuyarait-tEnga vaittADinAn enrum avan ninaivil mUzhga vaittAn
Onga vaittAn viraha tApam adaittAn OyAmal shOdanai pala vaittAn
				(madhyamakAla)
tAngoNAt-tanimai tandu vaittAn andat-taLir koDiyai kaNgaL kalanga vaittAn
vEingkuzhal vEndanai rAdhaiyumE tAn veTri koNDAL muDivil vindai idaik-kaNDu tAn
